description: A leather baldric worn diagonally across the chest for carrying a sword

core:description.text: A broad leather strap worn diagonally from shoulder to hip, designed to carry a sword at the wearer's back or side. The leather has been oiled to a warm brown sheen and reinforced at the stress points with rivets. An adjustable frog allows the sword to hang at the perfect height for a quick draw, whether standing or mounted.
